title: What happens if I am in game during maintenance?

replies.body:
If the queue gets disabled it happens a while before the maintenance actually starts, so you'll have time to finish your game, but won't be able to start another.

If you are in a queue that doesn't get disabled (like normals) you'll just get kicked out of the game. To the best of my knowledge and experience this doesn't apply any penalties like dodge timers or Low Priority Queues.
